trans-unit.source: Create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service, by using Visual Studio 2013.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service, by using Visual Studio 2013.

trans-unit.source: Create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Create an ASP.NET API app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: This tutorial shows how to create an ASP.NET Web API project that is configured for deployment to the cloud as an [API app in Azure App Service](app-service-api-apps-why-best-platform.md).
trans-unit.target: This tutorial shows how to create an ASP.NET Web API project that is configured for deployment to the cloud as an [API app in Azure App Service](app-service-api-apps-why-best-platform.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure an existing Web API project for deployment as an API app, see [Configure a Web API project as an API app](app-service-dotnet-create-api-app-visual-studio.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about how to configure an existing Web API project for deployment as an API app, see [Configure a Web API project as an API app](app-service-dotnet-create-api-app-visual-studio.md).

trans-unit.source: Subsequent tutorials in the series show how to [deploy](app-service-dotnet-deploy-api-app.md) and [debug](../app-service-dotnet-remotely-debug-api-app.md) the API app project that you create in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent tutorials in the series show how to [deploy](app-service-dotnet-deploy-api-app.md) and [debug](../app-service-dotnet-remotely-debug-api-app.md) the API app project that you create in this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial requires version 2.6 or later of the Azure SDK for .NET.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial requires version 2.6 or later of the Azure SDK for .NET.

trans-unit.source: When the instructions direct you to enter a name for the project, enter **ContactsList**.
trans-unit.target: When the instructions direct you to enter a name for the project, enter **ContactsList**.

trans-unit.source: Your API app is now ready to be deployed, and you can follow the [Deploy an API app](app-service-dotnet-deploy-api-app.md) tutorial to do that.
trans-unit.target: Your API app is now ready to be deployed, and you can follow the [Deploy an API app](app-service-dotnet-deploy-api-app.md) tutorial to do that.
